name: The Fall of Calidi
description:
How to Play:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact (inspect itens, collect)

LMB (Left Mouse Button) - Melee Attack

RMB (Right Mouse Button) - Ranged Attack (when enabled)

Spacebar - Dash

Useful Links:

Concept Arts by José Rafael

Credits:

Pedro Ivens - Animator

Ruhan Bello - Project Manager, Game/Level Designer, Auxiliar Programmer
